General.Name: Wishbone Gold Plc
General.Description: Wishbone Gold Plc, together with its subsidiaries, engages in gold production and trading activities in Australia. It explores for gold, silver, copper, lead, and other metals. The company's projects include the Red Setter and Cottesloe projects located in the Patersons Range region of Western Australia; and the White Mountain project located in Queensland. It holds interests in the Wishbone II, IV, and VI projects located in Queensland. In addition, the company has an option to acquire a 100% interest in the Anketell Gold Copper project located in Patersons Range, Western Australia. Wishbone Gold Plc was incorporated in 2009 and is based in Gibraltar.
